meanings.definition: The horizontal timber or beam at the top of a roof, on which the upper ends of the rafters rest.
meanings.sent1: The rooftrees provide support for the roof structure.
meanings.sent2: Birds often perch on the rooftrees of our house.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the rooftrees played a game of hide-and-seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the rooftrees cast long shadows across the yard.
meanings.sent5: The rooftrees creaked in the wind, singing a lullaby to the sleeping house.

meanings.definition: The highest point or summit of something.
meanings.sent1: Reaching the rooftrees of the mountain was a challenging climb.
meanings.sent2: The rooftrees of success are different for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The rooftrees of the roller coaster offered a thrilling view of the park.
meanings.sent4: Atop the skyscraper, the rooftrees seemed to touch the sky itself.
meanings.sent5: From the rooftrees of fame, one can see far and wide into the world below.
